docs.lead_paragraph: Starting in 2014, insurers will be required to offer a clearly defined package of essential health benefits comparable to the comprehensive coverage ordinarily provided by employer plans.

headline.main: In Health Law, a Clearer View of Coverage
headline.print_headline: In Health Law, a Clearer View of Coverage

docs.snippet: Starting in 2014, insurers will be required to offer a clearly defined package of essential health benefits comparable to the comprehensive coverage ordinarily provided by employer plans.

docs.lead_paragraph: The primal economic divide in America remains the chasm between the wealth of black and white families, and it has widened steadily over the last generation.

headline.main: Wealth, Race and the Great Recession

docs.abstract: The gap in assets between white and black families has "more than quadrupled over the course of a generation," a study finds.
docs.snippet: The gap in assets between white and black families has "more than quadrupled over the course of a generation," a study finds.

docs.lead_paragraph: Daniel Larison wonders about the enthusiasm that reform-minded American conservatives (like yours truly, among others) have expressed for the decentralizing, Philip Blond-influenced, "Red Tory" aspects of David Cameron's project in Britain:
docs.abstract: Is it strange that reform-minded American conservatives are drawn to David Cameron?
docs.snippet: Is it strange that reform-minded American conservatives are drawn to David Cameron?

docs.lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appear daily in The New York Times and online in our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit your wallet.

headline.main: How Do I Buy the New Long-Term Care Insurance?

docs.abstract: The new health care law establishes a government-run insurance program for long-term care, but many of the details have yet to be decided.
docs.snippet: The new health care law establishes a government-run insurance program for long-term care, but many of the details have yet to be decided.

docs.lead_paragraph: The National Federation of Independent Business, never a fan of Democratic-inspired health care reform, announced Friday that it would join 20 states that are suing to have the law invalidated. "The fundamental mission of our organization is to promote and protect the rights of small businesses and the self-employed to own, operate and grow their business," said Dan Danner, N.F.I.B. president, in a statement, "and this health care law directly undermines this core value."

headline.main: N.F.I.B. Joins Suit Against Health Reform

docs.abstract: The National Federation of Independent Business especially objects to the law's employer mandate.
docs.snippet: The National Federation of Independent Business especially objects to the law's employer mandate.

docs.lead_paragraph: Updated Below | 4:29 p.m. Pageant organizers on Sunday night crowned a 24-year-old Lebanese immigrant from Michigan as Miss USA 2010.

headline.main: In Miss USA Contest, a Novel Twist

docs.abstract: A Lebanese immigrant took the Miss USA crown in a year when immigration law was a topic contestants were asked about.
docs.snippet: A Lebanese immigrant took the Miss USA crown in a year when immigration law was a topic contestants were asked about.
